EnhancedContent:
Thank you for your interest in the new Azure SDKs! We release new features, improvements, and bug fixes every month. Subscribe to our [Azure SDK Blog RSS Feed](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/feed/) to get notified when a new release is available.

You can find links to packages, code, and docs on our [Azure SDK Releases page](https://aka.ms/azsdk/releases).

## Release highlights

### [AI Projects 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/ai-projects/v/1.0.0) for JavaScript and [AI Projects 1.0.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-ai-projects/1.0.0/) for Python

The Azure AI Projects libraries have reached general availability, providing comprehensive libraries for working with Azure AI Foundry projects. These libraries enable developers to manage AI workflows, access authentication services, and integrate with Azure OpenAI services. Note that some preview features like Evaluations and Red Team operations have been moved to separate beta versions to maintain stable API surfaces.

### [Storage Data Movement 12.2.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Storage.DataMovement/12.2.0) for .NET

The Azure Storage Data Movement library for .NET has been updated with important bug fixes for handling files and directories with special characters in their names. This release resolves issues that could cause transfer failures or incorrect encoding of destination file names when copying or uploading files with URL-encoded characters, improving reliability for data transfer operations across Azure Storage services.

### Initial stable releases

- **Client Libraries for Java**
- [Monitor Query Logs 1.0.0](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure/azure-monitor-query-logs/1.0.0)
- [Monitor Query Metrics 1.0.0](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure/azure-monitor-query-metrics/1.0.0)
- **Client Libraries for JavaScript**
- [Monitor Query Logs 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/monitor-query-logs/v/1.0.0)
- [Monitor Query Metrics 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/monitor-query-metrics/v/1.0.0)
- [AI Projects 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/ai-projects/v/1.0.0)
- **Client Libraries for Python**
- [Monitor Query Metrics 1.0.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-monitor-querymetrics/1.0.0/)
- [AI Projects 1.0.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-ai-projects/1.0.0/)
- **Management Libraries for Java**
- [Resource Management – Carbon Optimization 1.0.0](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure.resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-carbonoptimization/1.0.0)
- [Resource Management – Recovery Services Data Replication 1.0.0](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure.resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-recoveryservicesdatareplication/1.0.0)
- **Management Libraries for JavaScript**
- [Resource Management – Carbon Optimization 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/arm-carbonoptimization/v/1.0.0)
- [Resource Management – Recovery Services Data Replication 1.0.0](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/arm-recoveryservicesdatareplication/v/1.0.0)
- **Management Libraries for Python**
- [Resource Management – Carbon Optimization 1.0.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-mgmt-carbonoptimization/1.0.0/)
- [Resource Management – Recovery Services Data Replication 1.0.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-mgmt-recoveryservicesdatareplication/1.0.0/)
- **Management Libraries for Go**
- [Resource Management – Carbon Optimization 1.0.0](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/resourcemanager/carbonoptimization/armcarbonoptimization@v1.0.0)
- [Resource Management – Recovery Services Data Replication 1.0.0](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/resourcemanager/recoveryservicesdatareplication/armrecoveryservicesdatareplication@v1.0.0)

- [Core – OpenTelemetry 0.1.0](https://crates.io/crates/azure_core_opentelemetry/0.1.0)
- **Management Libraries for .NET**
- [Resource Management – Playwright 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.Playwright/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [Resource Management – Storage Discovery 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.StorageDiscovery/1.0.0-beta.1)
- **Management Libraries for JavaScript**
- [Resource Management – Storage Discovery 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@azure/arm-storagediscovery/v/1.0.0-beta.1)
- **Management Libraries for Python**
- [Resource Management – Storage Discovery 1.0.0b1](https://pypi.org/project/azure-mgmt-storagediscovery/1.0.0b1/)
- **Management Libraries for Go**
- [Resource Management – Storage Discovery 0.1.0](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/resourcemanager/storagediscovery/armstoragediscovery@v0.1.0)
- [Resource Management – Deployments 0.1.0](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/resourcemanager/resources/armdeployments@v0.1.0)

Author: Ronnie Geraghty
Description:
Azure SDK releases every month. In this post, you'll find this month's highlights and release notes.

The post [Azure SDK Release (August 2025)](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/azure-sdk-release-august-2025/) appeared first on [Azure SDK Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk).
Title: Azure SDK Release (August 2025)
